howItWorks.title: How Suvidha Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple three-step process to make your voice heard.

step1.title: 1. Report an Issue
step1.description: Snap a photo or video, add a description, and pinpoint the location of a civic problem.

step2.title: 2. Community Upvotes
step2.description: Fellow citizens view and upvote your report, increasing its visibility and urgency.

step3.title: 3. Get it Fixed
step3.description: Authorities get notified. You can track the progress and see real change happen.
